translation.en: [man 1] Uh, this is Rattlesnake. Hostiles in the area.
translation.es: Soy Rattlesnake. Hay enemigos en la zona.
Una frontera controlada por un despiadadomilitar criminal llamado Viktor Koval,
un fantasma que pocos han visto. ¡Saquen los Gumps!
Para combatir el creciente poder de Koval,

translation.en: [man 3] Jesus! IED blast ahead! Gumps down! We cannot move forward!
-[man 4] Sarge, it's a fuckin' ambush! -[man 3] Fuck, they're everywhere!
-[man 6] Fuck! They took out the APC. -[man 7] Sarge, we need to fall back.
translation.es: - Volaron el vehículo.- Hay que retroceder, sargento.

translation.en: [Bigfoot] I'm on my way. Are we pushing through?
I think we lost the entire Gump unit, and we have a man trapped. Over!
translation.es: Perdimos la unidad de Gumpsy hay un hombre caído. ¡Cambio!

translation.en: [man 8] Can't see shit! Where the fuck are the Gumps?
Gomez! Get your ass over here.
-Where the fuck are they shooting from? -They're fuckin' everywhere.
translation.es: - ¿Desde dónde disparan?- Están por todas partes.

translation.en: -Where the fuck are the Gumps? -[man 9] I've got you!
We need to get him out of there. See a way through?
translation.es: Debemos sacarlo de ahí. ¿Ves una salida?

translation.en: [Bigfoot] Rattlesnake, I need cover! [Sgt.] Concentrate fire on the building.
[Bigfoot] Sarge, we can't get to him! It's too far.
translation.es: ¡Sargento, no llegamos a él!Está muy lejos.

translation.en: [Sgt.] I repeat, I'm not leaving anyone behind.
translation.es: Repito, no dejaré a nadie atrás.

translation.en: [Bigfoot] Rattlesnake, come on. I need cover. I'm hit!
[Sgt.] This is Rattlesnake. I hear you loud and clear.
-We'll be there. Stay where you are. -Rattlesnake,
translation.es: Ya vamos. No te muevas. Rattlesnake, habla Rolling Thunder.

translation.en: Unidentified vehicle approaching at high speed.
translation.es: Se acerca un vehículo no identificado.Potencial ataque.

translation.en: Potential attack. Requesting permission to engage.
translation.es: Se acerca un vehículo no identificado.Potencial ataque. Permiso para proceder.

translation.en: Hold on. I got you, buddy. Come on.
Permission denied. Two of our men trapped.
We have an additional 38 men on the ground.
translation.es: Hay 38 hombres más en tierra, sargento.

translation.en: They're a priority. I need you to fall back. Over.
Let me get my men out!
Bale, confirm Hellfire with Captain Brydon.
translation.es: Confirma el Hellfirecon el capitán Brydon.

translation.en: Yes, sir.Base, this is Rolling Thunder,
translation.es: Sí, señor. Base, soy Rolling Thunder.

translation.en: requesting permission for air strike. Over.
translation.es: Solicito permiso de ataque aéreo. Cambio.

translation.en: Rattlesnake, I need that cover! Do you copy?
Stay there, hold position. We'll come get you.
translation.es: Mantén la posición. Iremos a buscarte.

translation.en: Rattlesnake, I need you to fall back, over.
[Sgt.] I repeat! Two of our men trapped! Over!
this is Rolling Thunder. Do I have permission to engage?
translation.es: Base Amber, habla Rolling Thunder. ¿Puedo proceder?

translation.en: I have a heavily armored truck, broad wheelbase.

translation.es: Probable lanzamisiles. Rolling Thunder, espere la orden.

translation.en: this is Amber Base, hold for command.
Truck's too close to our men to risk Hellfire.
translation.es: Ya no podemos lanzar el misil.

translation.en: Rattlesnake, do you copy? I'm getting fucking hit down here!
[Sgt.] All right, Fire team, prepare for cover fire.
That's a launch-- That's a launcher, sir.
No launcher visible in my feed.
-Fire request denied. -I'm positive that's a launcher, sir.
translation.es: Permiso denegado. Es un lanzamisiles, señor.

translation.en: Impact is imminent. Over. You heard him!
Hold fire till I clear my men!
plus two exposed. They'll all die.
[Sgt.] We'll be there! Stay where you are!
DA1 off the rail on three…
What the fuck, Harp? You disobeyed a direct order.
And one US Army Gump destroyed.
translation.es: y un Gump de nuestro ejército destruido.

translation.en: I made the call that felt most correct given the intel available--
translation.es: Decidí lo que creí correctoen base a la información…

translation.en: With all due respect, Captain, with 40 men on the ground, I saved 38,
translation.es: Con todo respeto, capitán,salvé a 38 de los 40 hombres allí,

translation.en: including Master Sergeant Miller and his convoy.
translation.es: incluido el sargento Miller y su convoy.

translation.en: If Miller had been given the chance, he would've tried to save all 40.
translation.es: De haber podido,Miller habría intentado salvar a los 40.

translation.en: But you took that option away from him.
translation.es: Pero tú le quitaste esa opción.

translation.en: When did you do your basic?
Have you ever experienced a mass-casualty encounter, other than from behind your screen?
translation.es: ¿Tuviste experienciacon muchas bajas por fuera de la pantalla?

translation.en: Have you spent time in a conflict zone, Harp?
translation.es: ¿Has estado en una zona de conflicto?
- No, señora, pero yo…- Gracias, teniente.

translation.en: Captain, this can't be the only option.
translation.es: Esta no puede ser la única opción.
Querían llevarte a una corte marcial.Luché por ti.

translation.en: -I fought for you. -What am I gonna tell Olivia?
translation.es: Querían llevarte a una corte marcial.Luché por ti. ¿Y Olivia?

translation.en: Tell her you're going on an all-expenses-paid refresher in how to make the world a safer place.
translation.es: Dile que te pagamos un cursopara hacer del mundo un lugar mejor.

translation.en: I like you, Harp. You're precise, efficient. Brilliant drone pilot.
translation.es: Me agradas. Eres preciso y eficiente.Gran piloto de drones.

translation.en: But you disobeyed a direct order.
Your CO at Camp Nathaniel is a Captain Leo.
translation.es: Tu oficial en Campo Nathanaelserá el capitán Leo.

translation.en: Camp Nathaniel? That's where the platoon's based.
translation.es: ¿Campo Nathanael?Ahí es donde está el pelotón.

translation.en: Keep your head down. See it as an opportunity to meet your fellow servicemen.
translation.es: Considéralo una oportunidadpara conocer a tus colegas.

translation.en: Let's pray you're a fast learner. Dismissed.
translation.es: Oremos para que aprendas rápido.Puedes retirarte.

translation.en: -[buzzer] -[man 1] Let's go, guys. Let's get moving!
Move it, soldier. This is your new home, maggots.
translation.es: Muévete, soldado. Este es su nuevo hogar, gusanos.

translation.en: Get into three separate lines to get scanned in.
translation.es: Formen tres filas para el escaneo.

translation.en: You'll be seeing a lot of my pretty face.
Get scanned in by the Gumps and keep it moving.
Your digs are in Sections 2 and 4, ahead on your left.
translation.es: Dormirán en las Secciones 2 y 4,a la izquierda.

translation.en: Let's go. What are you waiting for?
-[beeping] -Look at them straight in the eye. -Do not hesitate. -[Gump beeps]
translation.es: Mírenlo directo a los ojos. No titubeen.

translation.en: [man 1] They smell fear, boys. Keep it moving, soldiers. Come on!
translation.es: Huelen el miedo, muchachos.No paren, soldados. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Hey, eyes on the prize, soldier. Eyes on the prize. Come on.
Left foot, right foot, keep it going. Why are you being so slow? Come on!
translation.es: ¡Pie izquierdo, pie derecho, así! ¿Por qué vas tan lento?

translation.en: Excuse me. Hi, I'm looking for Captain Leo.
translation.es: Disculpe. Hola, busco al capitán Leo.

translation.en: Oh man. I don't know. You better talk to Colonel Eckhart.
translation.es: No sé. Será mejor que hablescon el coronel Eckhart.

translation.en: -He's by the medical tent right there. -Thank you.
translation.es: - Está junto a esa carpa.- Gracias.

translation.en: [man 1] Hey! I am not gonna let my men bleed out on this stretcher here. Move!
translation.es: No dejaré que mis hombressalgan a la inspección. - ¡Vamos!- Hagan lugar. Llegan más.

translation.en: [man 2] Make room. Got another one coming.

translation.es: Teniente Harp, señor.Me enviaron desde la Base Creech.

translation.en: Posted here from Creech Air Force Base. Looking for Captain Leo.
translation.es: Teniente Harp, señor.Me enviaron desde la Base Creech. Busco al capitán Leo.

translation.en: [laughs] You must've really fucked up if they sent you to Leo.
translation.es: La habrás cagado si te envían con Leo.

translation.en: You don't have permission to speak until I ask you a question.
translation.es: No puedes hablarhasta que te haga una pregunta.

translation.en: You even know why you're here?

translation.es: Experientum Auctoriat, señor. "La autoridad de la experiencia".No lo digas en latín. Explícame.

translation.en: Don't give it a Latin name, shit. Explain it to me.
translation.es: "La autoridad de la experiencia".No lo digas en latín. Explícame.

translation.en: Uh, it's an Ethics Committee dictate, sir.
translation.es: Es orden del Comité de Ética, señor.

translation.en: It proposes UAV pilots would exercise greater caution if they experienced--
translation.es: Sugiere que los pilotos de dronesdeben experimentar…

translation.en: The Ethics Committee is a PR team.
This dictate is a bullshit pass for pilots who fuck up.
translation.es: Esa orden es una licencia ridículapara pilotos que la cagan.

translation.en: You killed two marines. You should be in jail.
translation.es: Mataste a dos marines.Deberías estar preso.

translation.en: Someone deemed the dollar value of your training to be higher than the lives of those two men.
translation.es: Pero alguien creyó que tu entrenamientovalía más que esas dos vidas.

translation.en: If you survive, Air Force keeps a pilot.
translation.es: Si sobrevives,la Fuerza Aérea conserva un piloto.

translation.en: You don't, you're a cautionary tale to all the other fly-by-wire assholes.
translation.es: Si mueres, eres una advertenciapara los demás pilotos a distancia.

translation.en: -With all due respect, sir-- -I didn't ask you a question, son.
translation.es: - Con todo respeto, señor…- No te hice una pregunta.

translation.en: Can you believe we have to read all this and file it?
translation.es: Tenemos que leer todo esto y archivarlo.

translation.en: [female announcer] Remaining charging time for Gump unit C-45, 20 minutes.
translation.es: Tiempo de carga restantepara la unidad Gump C-45, 20 minutos.
desempeño de 99 por ciento,disciplina de 99 por ciento,

translation.en: Engaged to Olivia Rose Meyer of Carlsbad.
translation.es: comprometido con Olivia Rose Meyerde Carlsbad.

translation.en: To be married in Palm Springs.
It's a very nice part of the world.
translation.es: Es una parte bonita del mundo.

translation.en: Did I leave anything out other than your kills and commendations
translation.es: ¿Olvidé mencionar algo,más allá de tus logros y distinciones,

translation.en: or the fact that you can't appreciate culture, or you just don't know when to shut the fuck up?
translation.es: como que no sabes apreciar la culturani cuándo cerrar la boca?

translation.en: How many insurgents have you killed, Harp?
My numbers are consistent with mission goals and flight hours, sir.
translation.es: Mis números coincidencon los objetivos y horas de vuelo, señor.
Maldición, qué hijo de puta sin corazón.

translation.en: Far too many names to memorize and recite, sir.
translation.es: Demasiados nombrespara memorizar y recitar, señor.

translation.en: If you could, would you really want to?
I'm aware we kill people, Captain. If you were aware of that, you wouldn't be here.
translation.es: - Sé que matamos gente, capitán.- Si fuera así, no estarías aquí.

translation.en: If I were… would you be disappointed?
-Why would I be disappointed? -'Cause that means you flew 10,000 miles
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Porque significaría que viniste hasta aquípara controlar equipos.

translation.en: to sign equipment out of a warehouse.
translation.es: Porque significaría que viniste hasta aquípara controlar equipos.

translation.en: The fuck do you think you are?
Daddy pay your way through cadet school so you could mind your Ps and Qs?
translation.es: ¿Papá paga tus estudios de cadetepara que cuides tus modales?

translation.en: With all due respect, I put myself through cadet school.
translation.es: Con todo respeto,yo mismo me pagué la escuela de cadetes.

translation.en: We have to deliver these vaccines to a clinic.
translation.es: Llevaremos estas vacunas a una clínica.
Veinte kilómetros fuera de la reja.

translation.en: There's an outbreak of cholera, and it's spreading fast.
translation.es: Hay un brote de cóleray se está propagando rápido.

translation.en: It might be a war zone, but women and children still get sick.
translation.es: Es zona de guerra,pero las mujeres y los niños se enferman.

translation.en: Yes. I'm hearts and minds. Ostensibly. [chuckles lightly]
So, what do you really do?

translation.es: MARSOC. Operaciones Especialesdel Cuerpo de Marines.

translation.en: I locate and remove advanced weapons from insurgents beyond the wire.
translation.es: Localizo y elimino armas avanzadasde los insurgentes por fuera de la reja.

translation.en: And what do you do? Put them in filing cabinets?
It's the latest in counter-intel technology.
Beats the hell out of those Russian hackers.
translation.es: Les gana a esos hackers rusos, carajo.

translation.en: -You can sign it or read all 90 pages. -Oh. No, sir.
translation.es: - Puedes firmarlo o leer las 90 páginas.- No, señor.

translation.en: You ever heard the name Viktor Koval?
translation.es: ¿Has oído el nombre de Viktor Koval?

translation.en: Yeah. Heard insurgents say it on intercepted radio comms.
translation.es: Sí. Oí que los insurgenteslo nombraban por radios interceptadas.

translation.en: Forget what you heard in the air. You're on the ground now, kid.
translation.es: Olvida lo que oíste en el aire.Ahora estás en tierra.

translation.en: Viktor Koval is a Krasny warlord.
translation.es: Viktor Koval es un caudillo krasny.

translation.en: The Krasny wanna make the Ukraine a part of Russia.
translation.es: Los krasnysquieren que Ucrania sea parte de Rusia.

translation.en: -[Harp] Like in the good old days. -Opposing them are the Resistance.
translation.es: - Como en los viejos tiempos.- Se les opone la Resistencia.

translation.en: They're a militia set up to defend the independence of the Ukraine.
translation.es: Son una miliciaque defiende la independencia de Ucrania.

translation.en: But the Krasnys are getting stronger with the full support of Moscow.
translation.es: Pero los krasnys se están fortaleciendocon el apoyo de Moscú.

translation.en: It's a war that's got too hot for the UN,
translation.es: La guerra se complicó mucho para la ONU,

translation.en: so now we're the assholes in the middle of it,
translation.es: y ahora somos los imbéciles en el medio.

translation.en: We're the only thing stopping these guys from committing genocide.
translation.es: Evitamos un genocidioentre los dos grupos.

translation.en: You believe that, I have a timeshare in Florida I want to sell you.
translation.es: Si crees eso, puedo venderteuna multipropiedad en Florida.

translation.en: No, we're talking about Viktor Koval, the Terror of the Balkans.
translation.es: No, estamos hablando de Viktor Koval,el Terror de los Balcanes.

translation.en: There's Intel that says Koval is responsible for the dirty bomb
translation.es: Creemos que Koval es responsable de la bomba que explotó en Kiev
de la bomba que explotó en Kiev

translation.en: This motherfucker may be responsible for 25,000 people's deaths.
translation.es: Este maldito puede ser culpablede la muerte de 25 000 personas.

translation.en: My sources tell me he's trying to get to Systema Perimeter.
translation.es: Se dice que intenta llegaral Sistema Perímetro.

translation.en: That's Russia's automated nuclear retaliation system.
translation.es: Es el sistema nuclear rusode contraataque.

translation.en: the country still held one-third of Russia's nuclear arsenal.
translation.es: el país tenía un terciodel arsenal nuclear de Rusia.

translation.en: Silos scattered across the country at top-secret locations,
translation.es: Misiles dispersos por todo el país,en lugares secretos,

translation.en: ready to strike anywhere in the world.
translation.es: listos para atacar en cualquier sitio.

translation.en: But it was shut down like 50 years ago, after the Cold War.
translation.es: Pero se cerró hace 50 años,después de la Guerra Fría.

translation.en: You really think Russia would dismantle its one true safeguard against attack?
translation.es: ¿Crees que Rusia desmantelaríasu única salvaguarda contra ataques?

translation.en: You telling me the Russian systems are still functioning?
translation.es: ¿O sea que los sistemas rusossiguen funcionando?

translation.en: he's trying to get to the nukes here in Ukraine?
CIA sources say that the Kremlin's lost control of Koval.
translation.es: La CIA dice que el Kremlinperdió el control de Koval.

translation.en: My informant believes Koval's gonna make a move for those nukes
translation.es: Y mi informante cree que Kovalbuscará esas armas

translation.en: And if all this is true,
translation.es: Y si todo eso es cierto,

translation.en: imagine what he'll do if he gets his hands on those silos.
translation.es: imagina lo que harási llega a esos misiles.
Un terrorista loco con armas nucleares.

translation.en: Downtown Washington, New York, Paris. Who knows?
translation.es: El centro de Washington,Nueva York, París. ¿Quién sabe?

translation.en: What I do know is, there won't be a pretty little wedding in Palm Springs,
translation.es: Lo que sí sé es que no habráuna boda agradable en Palm Springs,

translation.en: unless you're wearing factor 500 UV protection.
translation.es: a menos que usesprotector solar factor 5000.

translation.en: Now, we deliver these vaccines to the hospital,
translation.es: Ahora entregamos estas vacunasen el hospital

translation.en: and my informant will feed us intel on Koval's next plan.
translation.es: y nos enteraremossobre el próximo plan de Koval.

translation.en: With all due respect, sir, I think there's been a mistake.
translation.es: Con todo respeto, señor,creo que hay un error.

translation.en: [Harp] No, I don't mean it like that, sir.
You wear your uniform, you'll be a standing target.
translation.es: Si usas tu uniforme,serás un blanco obvio.

translation.en: -Thought I'd be guarding the fence, sir. -[chuckles]
translation.es: Pensé que protegería la cerca, señor.

translation.en: I don't have any specialist training as a field agent.
translation.es: No tengo formación especialcomo agente de campo.

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm special enough for both of us.
translation.es: No te preocupes.Yo soy tan especial que valgo por dos.
- Usted es…- Tu oficial a cargo.

translation.en: Fourth-generation biotech, and I'm gonna give you 60 seconds to deal with it.
translation.es: Biotecnología de cuarta generación,y te doy 60 segundos para acostumbrarte.

translation.en: I'm-- I'm sorry, what, Captain? [clears throat]
Do you feel as though you can trust me, Harp?
-I, uh-- -[Leo] We're about to enter a war zone.
translation.es: - Yo…- Entraremos en zona de guerra.

translation.en: If I continue to instill shock and distrust,
I'll file your removal papers myself,
and you'll have to deal with the consequences.
translation.es: y tendrás que lidiarcon las consecuencias.

translation.en: So, what are you? Like, AI?
Your cell phone's AI. A Gump's AI.
translation.es: Tu celular tiene IA. Un Gump tiene IA.

translation.en: I'm a prototype. My existence is classified.
translation.es: Soy un prototipo.Mi existencia es clasificada.

translation.en: [Leo] Ask the right question, I'll give you the right answer.
translation.es: Cuando hagas la pregunta correcta,te responderé.

translation.en: Okay. What the hell are you?
You want my model number or tech specs?
Some asshole in Arlington thinks a vending machine can do a soldier's job.
translation.es: Creen que una máquinapuede hacer el trabajo de un soldado.

translation.en: -Aside from that, it's got a fucked rotor. -[Gump beeps]
You want me to take the butt of my gun and bash your ugly fucking mug in?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que te rompa la caracon la culata de mi arma?

translation.en: Only two people have clearance to know who and what I am.
translation.es: Hay solo dos autorizadospara saber quién y qué soy.

translation.en: Why was I assigned to you? I'm not qualified to go chasing nukes.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me asignaron con usted?No estoy calificado para esto.

translation.en: I can't do this alone. I need eyes on my back.
translation.es: No puedo hacer esto solo. Necesito apoyo.

translation.en: I needed someone who could think outside the box.
You respect me like the rest of your commanding officers.
translation.es: Me respetas como a los demás comandantes.

translation.en: Don't question my authority, and we'll get on fine.
translation.es: Si no me cuestionas, nos llevaremos bien.

translation.en: You recognize my voice, you son of a bitch?
Nothing I say will bring them back.
translation.es: Nada de lo que diga los devolverá.

translation.en: [man] Report of hostile activities in Sector 9.
translation.es: Informe de actividades enemigasen el Sector 9.

translation.en: We don't control any of the area outside the wire.
translation.es: No controlamosningún área fuera de la reja.

translation.en: Because attacks in it are so frequent.
translation.es: Porque los ataques son muy frecuentes.

translation.en: -[radio beeps] -[Miller] All units be advised. We are proceeding outside the wire.
translation.es: Aviso a todas las unidades.Procedemos a salir de la reja.

translation.en: If they attack, you're gonna need to shoot back.
Fight a war, never have to leave home.
translation.es: Pelear una guerrasin salir nunca de tu casa.

translation.en: When was the last time you saw her?

translation.es: - La semana pasada.- La semana pasada. Cielos.

translation.en: -You fucking somebody else? -Get the fuck outta here.
translation.es: - ¿Te acuestas con otra?- Cierra la boca.

translation.en: Come on. Look, I get a sense of arrogance from you.
translation.es: Vamos. Percibo arrogancia de tu parte.

translation.en: Guys like you, so dispassionate, so cold,
translation.es: Tipos como tú, tan desapasionados, fríos

translation.en: -Those are the guys that usually wander. -Yeah? Well, I'm faithful.
translation.es: Así suelen ser los infieles. ¿Sí? Bueno, soy fiel.
- ¿Ella te es fiel?- Sí, ella es…

translation.en: [scoffs] Why am I even having this conversation? Fair game, rookie.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué hablo de esto?- Es juego limpio, novato.

translation.en: I need your head out here, not thinking about if Olivia's at home
translation.es: Necesito tu cabeza aquí,sin pensar en si Olivia está en casa

translation.en: playing "put the beef in my taco" with her Pilates instructor.
translation.es: jugando a "relléname el taco"con su entrenador.

translation.en: -Her Pilates instructor's a woman. -Oh, even better!
translation.es: Su entrenadora es una mujer. Mejor, le gustan los dos bandos.Me cae bien.

translation.en: -She goes both ways. I knew I liked her. -We're getting married in September.
translation.es: Mejor, le gustan los dos bandos.Me cae bien. Nos casaremos en septiembre.¿Qué sabes de relaciones?

translation.en: What do you know about relationships? Aren't you like three years old?
translation.es: Nos casaremos en septiembre.¿Qué sabes de relaciones? ¿No tienes tres años?

translation.en: You got a picture of her?
Come on, man. Pull it out.
Holy shit. She's a hottie. Congratulations.
translation.es: Mierda. Es una belleza. Te felicito.

translation.en: "My Gummy Bear." [chuckles] She calls you Gummy Bear?
translation.es: "Mi Oso de gomita".¿Te llama Oso de gomita?

translation.en: -[radio beeps] -[Miller] This is Rattlesnake. We've been moved up to Yellow alert.
translation.es: Aquí Rattlesnake.Nos subieron a Alerta amarilla.

translation.en: [Leo] Look at these poor bastards. Stuck between us and Koval.
translation.es: Mira a estos desgraciados.Atrapados entre nosotros y Koval.

translation.en: [man] I got a bunch of civilians. Nine o'clock.
translation.es: Veo un grupo de civiles. Nueve en punto.

translation.en: We have reports from base of aid truck hit. Man down.
translation.es: Nos informan del ataquea un camión de provisiones. Hombre caído.Ataque a un camión de provisiones.
Hombre caído.Ataque a un camión de provisiones.

translation.en: All units prepare to exit the vehicle. Hostiles in the area.
translation.es: Todas las unidades, prepárensepara salir del vehículo, hay enemigos.

translation.en: Listen, put the Gumps out. Form a perimeter in front of the convoy.
translation.es: Saquen los Gumps.Formen un perímetro frente al convoy.

translation.en: -Get ready, kid. -All units on the ground.
[Miller] Let's keep it calm. Let's keep it clean.
translation.es: Mantengamos la calma. Que sea ordenado.

translation.en: -All Marines, defense formation. -What the fuck's going on?
Goddamn Gumps pre-empted. Charlie Nine, hold fire!
translation.es: Los malditos Gumps se adelantaron.Charlie Nueve, ¡alto!

translation.en: All of you guys, come on!
Captain, just a sec, sir. Sir?
[marine] Stand down! Put your weapons down.
-[Miller] Put 'em down! -Tell your men to put their guns down.
translation.es: - Bajen las armas.- ¡Retírense, maldita sea! Que sus hombres bajen las armas.

translation.en: Goddammit! Tell your men to lower their weapons now!
Tell your men to put their guns down.
[Leo] You gotta move this truck, we gotta get our men out of here.
translation.es: Muevan el camiónpara que saquemos a nuestros hombres.

translation.en: [Leo] We don't want to fight. You understand?
Get your men off the street. Let's get that truck moved.
translation.es: Saca a tus hombres.Vamos a mover el camión.

translation.en: -Go get those Marines. -What did you say to him?
translation.es: - Busquen a los marines.- ¿Qué le dijiste?

translation.en: [Leo] Said we had to get vaccines through.
-Is that all it took? -No, I gave him the aid truck.
translation.es: - ¿Solo eso?- Y le di el camión de auxilio.

translation.en: [scoffs] They had weapons, though. They weren't after food.
They can't be both? It's our job to identify, neutralize.
translation.es: - ¿No pueden ser ambos?- Debemos identificar y neutralizar.

translation.en: It's our job to stay alive long enough to get our intel
and focus on the bigger picture.
-We gotta get to the clinic. -[Miller] Keep your eyes open.
translation.es: Debemos ir a la clínica. Estén alerta, chicos.

translation.en: Just like that. We all go--

translation.es: ¡Mierda! Krasnys a las tres en punto.

translation.en: Try and concentrate fire on the building. Flush them out into the open.
translation.es: Intenten disparar al edificio.Que tengan que salir.

translation.en: We gotta make it to our contact!
We're gonna go ahead on foot!
Copy! We'll take care of this shitshow.
[Harp] That was Koval's men attacking us?
[Leo] Yeah, they hit the supply truck and waited for the locals to go for food.
translation.es: Sí, atacaron el camión de provisionesy esperaron que la gente buscara comida.

translation.en: Koval's getting closer. Popping up like a game of whack-a-mole.
translation.es: Koval se acerca.Aparece y desaparece en segundos.

translation.en: Makes you look aggressive. Trying to cultivate trust.
translation.es: Te hace ver agresivo.Tratamos de generar confianza.

translation.en: Keep your gun in the holster. It might just keep you alive.
translation.es: Deja tu arma en la funda.Podría mantenerte vivo.

translation.en: Miller doesn't know about our real mission?
Eckhart thinks you can manage this conflict from behind a fence.
translation.es: Eckhart quiere manejareste conflicto desde una cerca.

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta get dirty to see any real change.
translation.es: A veces hay que ensuciarsepara ver un cambio real.

translation.en: -He doesn't like you, you know. -[Leo sighs]

translation.es: Lo único que hago es sentir.

translation.en: -What? Can you feel pain? -Of course I can.
I couldn't empathize with you if I didn't. Like now, what do you feel?
translation.es: Si no, no podría empatizar.¿Qué sientes ahora?

translation.en: [Leo] That's good. That means you're here and alive.
translation.es: Qué bien. Significa que estás vivo.

translation.en: Do you ever wonder why I look like this, Harp?
translation.es: ¿Te preguntas por qué me veo así, Harp?

translation.en: Why would the Pentagon pick my face to represent the United States Marines?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el Pentágono eligió mi rostropara representar a los marines?

translation.en: Why wouldn't they make me a blond-haired, blue-eyed,
translation.es: ¿Por qué no fabricaronun tipo blanco, deportista,
de cabello rubio y ojos azules?

translation.en: Didn't wanna ask. Thought it might be robotist.
translation.es: No pregunté por miedo a ser robotista.

translation.en: My sleeve might say US, but my face conveys neutrality.
translation.es: Mi manga dice "Estados Unidos",pero mi rostro transmite neutralidad.

translation.en: Our contact is waiting for us.

translation.es: - Ese es el campamento Damsk, ¿no?- Sí.

translation.en: A refugee shelter run by the Resistance.
translation.es: Un campo de refugiados de la Resistencia.

translation.en: Shit. I've seen it from the air.
translation.es: Mierda. Lo vi desde el aire.

translation.en: Find out what they need and give it to them.
If Koval finds the nukes, it's the end of the world as we know it.
translation.es: Si Koval encuentra los misiles,es el fin de este mundo.

translation.en: [Viktor, in Ukrainian] Do you have the incendiary rounds?
[Viktor, in Ukrainian] Kill him. Kill them both.
What do you know about Viktor Koval?
-[man] Give him to us, Americans. -Tell me!
I hit you in your subclavian artery. You're gonna bleed out.
translation.es: Te herí en la arteria subclavia.Te vas a desangrar.

translation.en: Or do you wanna spend your final few moments with my friends here?
translation.es: ¿O quieres pasartus últimos momentos con mis amigos?

translation.en: -[Leo] Not for long. -[sniper chokes] [Leo] He's a fanatic.
translation.es: No por mucho tiempo. Es un fanático.

translation.en: -You gotta call this in. -Nothing to call in yet.
translation.es: - Debes dar aviso.- Nada que avisar aún.

translation.en: What are you talking about? We got insurgents. We got a sniper.
That's enough to get command to listen, to commit a fucking task force--
translation.es: Es suficiente para que nos escuchen,para conseguir un comando…

translation.en: All we have is enough for command to hold us up in bureaucracy three days
translation.es: Nos retendrán en trámites burocráticosdurante tres días

translation.en: while they consider if Perimeter's even a conversation.
translation.es: mientras decidensi el Perímetro tiene importancia.

translation.en: We don't have that kind of time.
If their spies and snipers are here, that means Koval isn't that far behind.
translation.es: Si sus espías y francotiradoresestán aquí, Koval no está lejos.

translation.en: You said we'd deliver the vaccines to get intel on Koval.
Where the fuck are we going?
I didn't say the intel was at the clinic.
translation.es: No dije que la obtendríamos en la clínica.Es una guerra real.

translation.en: This is a live-fire scenario, son. Think you can handle it?
translation.es: No dije que la obtendríamos en la clínica.Es una guerra real. - ¿Puedes manejarlo?- Dime qué escondes.

translation.en: I'll walk back to base, tell 'em you went rogue.
translation.es: Iré a la base y diré que te rebelaste.

translation.en: Stop staring at me like that. Did your motherboard freeze?
translation.es: Deja de mirarme así.¿Se congeló tu placa madre?

translation.en: Why are you such a pain in my motherfucking ass?
-Who programmed you to curse so much? -Nobody.
I respond to the asshole that's in front of me.
translation.es: Respondo al imbécil que tengo enfrente.

translation.en: How long do you think you'll survive out here on your own?
You killed two marines but saved 38.
translation.es: Matas a dos marines y salvas a 38.

translation.en: They should've put a fucking medal on your chest.
You mean you stepped outside your box, and they had to put you back?
translation.es: ¿Te saliste del esquemay te volvieron a meter?

translation.en: -Is that why you think you're here? -I broke chain of command.
translation.es: - ¿Crees que viniste por eso?- Rompí la cadena de mando.

translation.en: What about you? What's your mandate?
Shit, I'm no expert, but this seems beyond protocol for a r--
translation.es: No soy experto,pero esto parece salir del protocolo de…

translation.en: A hand. Soft tissue and heat--
I was created to simulate one to the exact necessity to do my damn job.
translation.es: Fui creado para parecer unocon el único objetivo de hacer mi trabajo.

translation.en: But I also have the ability to break the rules in certain circumstances.
translation.es: Pero también puedo romper las reglasen ciertas circunstancias.

translation.en: In extreme situations, I have the ability to act of my own volition.
translation.es: En situaciones extremassoy capaz de actuar por voluntad propia.

translation.en: And is this an extreme situation?
Ask me what you really wanna ask. How come you're so like us?
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieres saber?- ¿Por qué pareces tan humano?

translation.en: So, you equate humanity with emotion? I equate it with fault.
translation.es: - ¿Comparas humanidad con emoción?- La comparo con defecto.

translation.en: People are stupid, habitual, and lazy.
translation.es: Las personas son estúpidas,rutinarias y perezosas.

translation.en: Maybe humans aren't emotional enough, Lieutenant.
translation.es: Tal vez no sonlo suficientemente sensibles.

translation.en: Stay close, keep your mouth shut, and pay attention.
translation.es: Quédate cerca,cierra la boca y presta atención.

translation.en: Pleasure to meet you. Lieutenant Harp.
So formal. You'll be calling me ma'am next.
translation.es: Qué formal. Ahora me va a llamar señora.

translation.en: I hear you had some trouble in Damsk.
I've done everything you asked me to do, Sofiya.
translation.es: Hice todo lo que me pediste, Sofiya.

translation.en: I'm gonna need you to level with me, please.
-She can trust you. Right, Harp? -Uh, yeah.
It was definitely a Krasny spy?
I think Koval's one step away from operating the silos.
translation.es: Creo que Kovalestá a un paso de los misiles.

translation.en: The nuclear missiles can only be operated by highly classified access codes.
translation.es: Los misiles nucleares se activan con códigos de acceso clasificados.

translation.en: When the Cold War ended, an FSK agent got hold of those codes
translation.es: Tras la Guerra Fría,un agente ruso los obtuvo

translation.en: and hid them in a vault.
translation.es: y los escondió en una bóveda.

translation.en: Somewhere this side of the city.
The agent figured the codes would fetch a price.
translation.es: El agente pensó que un día valdrían mucho.

translation.en: -And Koval met that price. -I think so.
translation.es: - Y Koval pagó ese precio.- Creo que sí.

translation.en: If he knows where the silos are, and he gets those codes, he'll have access to nukes.
translation.es: Si encuentra los depósitos y los códigos,tendrá acceso a las armas.

translation.en: -Tell me where those codes are. -I don't know.
translation.es: - Dime dónde están esos códigos.- No sé.

translation.en: If we did, we'd have gotten to them already.
Well, tell me who might know.
to break into a vault, the Krasny would need to buy hardware here,
as they wouldn't be able to smuggle it or get it through our lines.
translation.es: No podrían pasarlos de contrabandopor nuestras líneas.

translation.en: [Sofiya] There's only one arsehole with access to the weapons they'd need
translation.es: Solo hay un imbécil con accesoal tipo de armas que necesitan

translation.en: who wouldn't think twice about betraying us.
He's an arms dealer called Varyk Oshlak.
translation.es: Es el traficante de armas Varyk Oshlak.

translation.en: If they went to him, he might know where it's located.
translation.es: Puede que él sepa dónde está la bóveda.

translation.en: Can you take us to him?
You'll need weapons of your own.
Sadly, no discounts for the US.
translation.es: No hay descuento para EE. UU.

translation.en: What? Hold up. You're buying weapons from her?
How do you think I pay for this orphanage?
You know these are illegal weapons, right?
-[Sofiya] You have to do this for us. -I know. I will.
translation.es: Hazlo por nosotros. Lo sé. Lo haré.
¿Y él? Estará bien.Es su primer día fuera de la reja.

translation.en: It's his first day outside the wire.
translation.es: Estará bien.Es su primer día fuera de la reja.

translation.en: How does it feel to see your work up close?
translation.es: ¿Qué se siente ver tu trabajo de cerca?

translation.en: Yeah. Most of these kids weren't orphaned by the civil war.
translation.es: Estos niños no son huérfanospor la guerra civil.

translation.en: [Leo] Hey, guys, we gotta get going. Get in the car.

translation.es: - ¿Estás segura de esto?- Ese es su auto.
- ¿Estás segura de esto?- Ese es su auto. Está aquí.

translation.en: You wanna try that again, or should I fuck you up a little?
translation.es: ¿Quieres intentar otra vezo te hago mierda?

translation.en: I haven't seen you for long. -I can see how much you missed me. -[chuckles]
translation.es: - Tanto tiempo.- Veo cuánto me extrañaste.

translation.en: Stop. I'll tell you whatever you want.
translation.es: Basta. Te diré lo que quieras.

translation.en: Did you sell weapons to a Krasny unit this morning?
translation.es: ¿Le vendiste armasa una unidad krasny esta mañana?

translation.en: Ten men. They took delivery one hour ago.
translation.es: Diez hombres. Se fueron hace una hora.

translation.en: Details, piece of shit. What did you sell them?
-Well, I'm a dead man if-- -Either I kill you or Koval kills you,
translation.es: Me matarán si… Te mato yo o te mata Viktor Koval,pero yo estoy más cerca.

translation.en: but I'm much closer right now.
translation.es: Te mato yo o te mata Viktor Koval,pero yo estoy más cerca.

translation.en: Guess he won't be needing his car.
translation.es: Supongo que no necesitará su auto.

translation.en: [in Ukrainian] I'm going to kill you!
-Fastest way to Passazryski street? -Head north, take Magistral.
translation.es: - Vamos a calle Passazryski.- Al norte, por Magistral.

translation.en: [scoffs] You know the streets by memory?
translation.es: - ¿Conoces todas las calles?- Como un taxista.

translation.en: -Like a fucking cab driver. -Like a fucking drone pilot.
translation.es: - ¿Conoces todas las calles?- Como un taxista. Como un piloto de drones.

translation.en: We can't go up against Koval alone. We gotta call in for backup.
translation.es: No podemos solos contra Koval. - Necesitamos refuerzos.- ¿Qué pasa? ¿Tienes miedo?

translation.en: Come on, Harp. What's wrong? You scared? [laughs]
At what point does your program shut down?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo se apaga tu programa?¿Cuándo violas órdenes?

translation.en: -At what point are you violating orders? -That's why you're here.
translation.es: ¿Cuándo se apaga tu programa?¿Cuándo violas órdenes? Por eso estás aquí.

translation.en: Our intel investigation into the Perimeter is not just cold. It was aborted.
translation.es: Nuestra investigaciónsobre el Perímetro no está frenada. Fue suspendida.

translation.en: An intel officer like you can follow an aborted line,
translation.es: Si un oficial como tú la retoma,se considera una corazonada.

translation.en: and it's considered a hunch. If I do it, it's a fault.
translation.es: Si un oficial como tú la retoma,se considera una corazonada. Si lo hago yo, es un defecto.

translation.en: Intel would take me offline, leaving Koval to win.
What about your internal systems? At what point do you cross the line?
translation.es: Pero ¿y tus sistemas internos?¿En qué punto cruzas la línea?

translation.en: When you're no longer with me.
I requested your deployment because I need your help.
translation.es: Solicité tu despliegueporque necesito tu ayuda.

translation.en: That means this whole shitty time, I'm the one breaking orders?
translation.es: ¿Eso significa que soy yoel que está violando órdenes?

translation.en: I'll go to jail! I can't do this shit.
translation.es: - Iré a prisión. No puedo.- Dime que me detenga.

translation.en: -Tell me to stop the car. -You'll stop?
translation.es: - Iré a prisión. No puedo.- Dime que me detenga. ¿Te detendrás?

translation.en: Tell me to stop the car!
We're the only ones searching for him.
But if you don't think it's worth your time, call it in,
translation.es: Pero si no creesque valga tu tiempo, repórtame,

translation.en: they'll shut me down, and you can fucking walk!
-Okay, let me… Let me think. -[Leo scoffs]
All I'm saying is, calling in for backup might not be such a bad idea.
translation.es: Lo único que digoes que pedir refuerzos no es mala idea.

translation.en: [Leo] Here we go. Keep your eyes open, kid.
There's something I need you to do for me.
translation.es: Necesito que hagas algo por mí.

translation.en: The Russians have the capability to detect the signal.
-They put your tracker on your back? -Cut it out.
translation.es: - ¿Tienes el rastreador en la espalda?- Córtalo.

translation.en: -Does it hurt? -Of course it fucking hurts.
This means we're partners now? Take it out.
[Leo] No matter what happens, Koval can't leave with those codes.
translation.es: Koval no puede irse con esos códigos.

translation.en: -[radio chatter in Russian] -Call Eckhart. Tell him Koval's in the building.
translation.es: Llama a Eckhart. Dile que Koval está aquí.

translation.en: It's okay. I'm here. You're safe now.
translation.es: Estoy aquí. Ya están a salvo.

translation.en: The fuck are you doing, Harp?
On Passazryski street. Koval's here. He's going after the codes.
translation.es: En Passazryski.Koval está aquí, quiere los códigos.

translation.en: You're not making any sense. Koval's where?
[quietly] Of course I don't make any fucking sense.
translation.es: Claro que no tiene sentido, carajo.

translation.en: Krasnys everywhere, and fucking Russian Gumps.
translation.es: Krasnys en todas partes y Gumps rusos.

translation.en: We need to call in the Marines. Get me eyes on the ground.
translation.es: - Necesitamos a los marines.- Quiero imágenes del lugar.

translation.en: [in Russian] Drop your weapons. Or she will die.
Take it easy, okay? No one else has to get hurt.
translation.es: Tranquilo.Nadie más tiene que salir herido.

translation.en: The Marines are coming. I'm sure we can work this out.
translation.es: Vienen los marines. Vamos a resolver esto.

translation.en: Why don't you let them go, huh?

translation.es: ¡Suéltalas! ¡Déjalos ir! Nadie mástiene por qué salir lastimado.

translation.en: -[whimpers] -No one else has to get hurt.
translation.es: ¡Déjalos ir! Nadie mástiene por qué salir lastimado.

translation.en: -[in Russian] Come on! -Look, it's all gonna be okay.
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Mira, todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: -[Eckhart] Go for Eckhart. -Gumps are firing on civilians.
translation.es: Habla Eckhart. Los Gumps disparan a civiles.

translation.en: -No one in command. Where are the Marines? -They're not coming.
translation.es: - Nadie al mando. ¿Y los marines?- No vendrán.

translation.en: What are you still doing there?
We're about to take out Koval. You need to move your ass now.
translation.es: Estamos a punto de liquidar a Koval.Tienen que irse ya.

translation.en: [announcement] ETA to target, T-minus two minutes.
Unless you wanna be that cautionary tale, you better move your ass, son.
translation.es: Si no quieres ser la advertencia,será mejor que te largues.

translation.en: There's civilians on the ground, sir, and Leo's still in there.
translation.es: Hay civiles en la zona,y Leo sigue adentro.

translation.en: ETA to target, T-minus one minute.
Hey! You gotta go inside now. Come on!
We're gonna go in there, okay? Okay. You ready?
I tried to save 'em, you know.
Now you see your work first-hand.
translation.es: Ahora ves tu trabajo en directo.

translation.en: -[Leo] Goddamn, you a cold motherfucker. -I'm aware we kill people, Captain.
translation.es: - Qué hijo de puta sin corazón.- Sé que matamos gente.

translation.en: [man] I don't wanna die down here!
What the fuck are you up to, Leo? Hmm?
A drone pilot with a history of gross disobedience,
translation.es: Un pilotocon un historial de desobediencia,

translation.en: punished and humiliated, and with nobody to believe anything I say
translation.es: castigado y humillado, al que nadie creía,salvo que tú me apoyaras.

translation.en: unless you back it up, so tell me what the fuck am I doing here,
translation.es: castigado y humillado, al que nadie creía,salvo que tú me apoyaras. ¡Así que, por favor, dime qué mierdahago aquí y para qué me usas!

translation.en: and what are you using me for?
translation.es: ¡Así que, por favor, dime qué mierdahago aquí y para qué me usas!

translation.en: Sounds like you don't trust me, Harp.
translation.es: Parece que no confías en mí, Harp.

translation.en: I chose you. I needed someone who could think outside the box.
translation.es: Yo te elegí.Necesitaba a alguien creativo.

translation.en: Leo, I'm ordering you to return us back to base immediately
translation.es: Leo, te ordeno que nos llevesde regreso a la base

translation.en: -or be in breach of your moral directives. -[Leo scoffs]
And the fact that I can act of my own volition scares you.
translation.es: ¿Te asusta que pueda actuarpor mi propia voluntad?

translation.en: No, you need me to validate you.
Oh, come on! Here we go.
You follow me, I follow you.
translation.es: Tú me sigues, yo te sigo.

translation.en: It's kinda like a paradox of command, isn't it?
translation.es: Es como una paradoja de mando, ¿no?

translation.en: -I'm ordering you to stop the fucking car. -Or what?
translation.es: - ¡Te ordeno que detengas el auto!- ¿O qué?

translation.en: My backup system allows me to relinquish the need for human authority
translation.es: Mi sistema me permite prescindirde la autoridad humana

translation.en: if said person is exhibiting improper or impaired judgment.
translation.es: cuando la personaexhibe un criterio inapropiado o alterado.
Y tú, amigo mío, has aplicadocriterios inapropiados y alterados

translation.en: have exercised improper, impaired judgment throughout this mission…
translation.es: Y tú, amigo mío, has aplicadocriterios inapropiados y alterados en toda la misión…

translation.en: [Leo] …including the removal of one fail-safe device.
translation.es: …incluida la remociónde un dispositivo de respaldo.

translation.en: A what? You told me that was your tracker.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Me dijiste que era tu rastreador.

translation.en: Thanks to your air strike back there…
translation.es: Y gracias a tu ataque aéreo…

translation.en: Tell him Koval's in the building.
Sometimes you gotta get dirty to see any real change.
translation.es: A veces hay que ensuciarsepara ver un cambio real.

translation.en: Hey, hey! Don't grow balls now.
translation.es: Oye. No te hagas el valiente ahora.

translation.en: You owe me more than this, man.
I just saved your fucking life.
[gasps] Hello? I can't fucking breathe in here!
The boss is coming! Be quiet.
What the fuck is that? [Sofiya] Sodium pentothal.
translation.es: - ¿Qué mierda es eso?- Tiopentato de sodio.

translation.en: It's truth serum. You'll tell us all we need to know.
translation.es: Es suero de la verdad. Nos dirás todo.

translation.en: -Are you the leader of the Resistance? -Are you our enemy?
translation.es: - ¿Eres la líder de la Resistencia?- ¿Eres el enemigo?

translation.en: No. No, I'm not your fucking enemy.
translation.es: No. No soy el enemigo, carajo.

translation.en: [laughs] It wasn't pentothal. It was antibiotic for your wounds.
translation.es: No era tiopentato.Era antibiótico para tus heridas.

translation.en: Right. Awesome joke. Hilarious, comical, very fucking funny.
translation.es: Qué buena broma.Muy divertida, me muero de risa.

translation.en: -Not until I know you're no threat. -I'm not a threat. Leo is.
translation.es: - Cuando sepa que no eres una amenaza.- Yo no. Leo sí.

translation.en: -I think he's going after Perimeter. -No, he's going for Koval.
translation.es: - Quiere atacar el Perímetro.- Quiere a Koval.
- Luego al Perímetro.- Koval está muerto.

translation.en: -He died in the bank strike. -He wasn't there.
translation.es: - Murió en el banco.- No estaba ahí.

translation.en: Leo's going to take control of the nuclear missiles for the Resistance.
translation.es: Leo conseguirálos misiles nucleares para la Resistencia.

translation.en: I told you I'd get the codes, Viktor.
translation.es: Te dije que tendría los códigos, Viktor.

translation.en: Why would you try to kill me?
What's stopping me from killing you and taking it?
You honestly think I would have them with me, Viktor?
translation.es: ¿De verdad crees que los traería conmigo?

translation.en: -We trust in Leo. -You trust in Leo?
He's more likely to take control of the nukes himself, and he used you.
translation.es: Es más probable que se apoderede las armas y que te haya usado.

translation.en: -He told you that? -Not in so many words.
I don't know exactly why he's doing it, but you can't trust him.
translation.es: No sé exactamente por qué lo hace,pero no puedes confiar en él.

translation.en: I want the location of Perimeter.
What do I get in return?
I didn't know your kind had such a sense of humor.
translation.es: No sabía que tenías sentido del humor.

translation.en: It's incredible what man is able to create.
translation.es: Es increíblelo que puede crear la humanidad.

translation.en: [Sofiya] I think I know Leo better than you, Lieutenant Harp.
translation.es: Creo que conozco a Leomejor que tú, teniente Harp.

translation.en: You see, Leo, he can't lie to himself.
translation.es: Verás, Leo no puede mentirse a sí mismo.

translation.en: He can't pretend there's virtue in an immoral act.
translation.es: No puede fingirque hay virtud en un acto inmoral.

translation.en: -He's learned who the real enemy is. -The real enemy. Who? The US military?
translation.es: - Conoció al verdadero enemigo.- ¿Quién? ¿El ejército de EE. UU.?

translation.en: They rationalize this war because it serves their fucking agenda.
translation.es: Justifican la guerrapor su propio plan secreto.
Esta es una misión de paz.

translation.en: Russia wants its former territories back.
The US wants to destabilize Russia by extending conflict in those countries.
translation.es: EE. UU. quiere ampliar el conflictoen esos países para perjudicar a Rusia.

translation.en: We are the ones who want fucking peace, Lieutenant Harp.
translation.es: Nosotros somoslos que queremos la paz, carajo.

translation.en: And if Leo's rogue operation makes sure you leave us in peace,
translation.es: Y si con la operación de Leoustedes nos dejan en paz,

translation.en: if your war machine turns against you, well then, why should I fucking care?
translation.es: ¿por qué carajo debe importarmeque su armamento se les rebele?
Un terrorista loco con armas nucleares.
El centro de Washington, Nueva York…

translation.en: He's gonna launch a nuclear strike on the US.
translation.es: Lanzará un ataque nuclear contra EE. UU.

translation.en: Or not when it's American lives.
It's not collateral. It's mass murder. You can't let him do this.
translation.es: No es eso.Es una masacre. ¡No puedes permitirlo!

translation.en: What will you do with so much power?
That's between me and my creator.
translation.es: Queda entre mi creador y yo.

translation.en: What would you do with it, Viktor?
-I knew you would say that. -Well, yeah. Can you say the same?
translation.es: - Sabía que dirías eso.- ¿Puedes decir lo mismo?
A partir de ahí, mando yo.

translation.en: We can be good allies in the worst to come.
translation.es: Podemos ser aliadoscuando las cosas se compliquen.

translation.en: Don't make me have to ruin this marvel of American technology.
translation.es: No me hagas arruinaresta maravilla de la tecnología.

translation.en: what makes you think that you're still calling shots?
translation.es: ¿qué te hace pensarque aún tomas las decisiones?

translation.en: You should have never tried to kill me.
How many people will die, Sofiya?
[Sofiya] Enough to teach Americans about collateral damage.
translation.es: Las suficientespara enseñarles sobre el daño colateral.

translation.en: I said, stay where you are!
Sergeant Miller has been briefed on Operation Leo. Go ahead.
translation.es: El sargento sabe sobre Leo. Habla.

translation.en: I appreciate that you had a rough time out there.
translation.es: Entiendo que la pasaste mal ahí afuera.

translation.en: Captain Leo was destroyed. We lost his signal immediately.
translation.es: El capitán Leo fue destruido.Perdimos su señal.

translation.en: He lost his signal 'cause I removed his fail-safe.
translation.es: Perdió la señalporque le quité el respaldo.
- ¿Qué hiciste qué?- Sé que la cagué, ¿sí?

translation.en: I know I fucked up, okay? But, sir, you've gotta listen to me.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hiciste qué?- Sé que la cagué, ¿sí? Pero deben escucharme.

translation.en: Leo has the codes, and he's going after the silos.
translation.es: Leo tiene los códigosy quiere los misiles.

translation.en: He's on his way to Koval.
You said Koval was at the bank.
-He's dead. -Leo tricked me. Koval was never there.
translation.es: - Está muerto.- Leo me engañó. Koval no estaba ahí.

translation.en: Wanted me to call in the drone strike so it would appear he'd been destroyed.
translation.es: Quería un ataque de dronespara hacerse pasar por muerto.

translation.en: You could've turned back, he would've been forced to comply.
translation.es: Podrías haber regresadoy Leo hubiese obedecido.

translation.en: Leo's smarter than we are. He's stronger, faster, and he can be very persuasive.
translation.es: Es más listo que nosotros. Es más fuerte, más rápido y persuasivo.

translation.en: This Viktor Koval Perimeter stuff, it's all bullshit!
translation.es: ¡Esto de Viktor Kovaly el Perímetro es una mentira!

translation.en: Anything to it, Intel would've made it priority.
translation.es: Si no, sería prioridad de inteligencia.

translation.en: I was eyes on the ground.
translation.es: Lo vi con mis propios ojos.

translation.en: -And Leo's going after it. -I thought Koval was.
translation.es: - Y Leo lo quiere.- Pensé que lo quería Koval.

translation.en: Leo's playing the Krasnys and the Resistance against each other.
translation.es: Leo enfrentó a los krasnysy a la Resistencia.

translation.en: They all have the same goal. Nuke the US mainland.
translation.es: Comparten un objetivo:destruir EE. UU. con armas nucleares.

translation.en: He can! He put a gun to my head and said something about a paradox of command.
translation.es: - Es imposible. No puede…- ¡Sí! Me apuntó a la cabezay habló de una paradoja de mando.

translation.en: Me using my judgment triggered his fail-safe directive
to relinquish his need to follow human authority.
translation.es: para que pudiera prescindirde la autoridad humana.

translation.en: -How do you know he's gonna meet Koval? -It's a long fucking story.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo sabes que verá a Koval?- Es una larga historia.

translation.en: Sir, we don't have time for this, okay?
translation.es: - ¿Cómo sabes que verá a Koval?- Es una larga historia. - No tenemos tiempo. Hay que encontrarlo.- ¿Cómo?
- No tenemos tiempo. Hay que encontrarlo.- ¿Cómo?

translation.en: Hmm? You made that practically impossible, Lieutenant. How's he getting around?
translation.es: - Lo hiciste prácticamente imposible.- ¿Cómo se traslada?

translation.en: Arms dealer. We've been tracking him for months.
translation.es: Traficante de armas.Lo seguimos hace meses.

translation.en: It'll take us hours to go through Central.
-What's going on? -I'll explain later for now, trust me, okay?
translation.es: - ¿Qué sucede?- Te explico luego, confía en mí.

translation.en: Okay. Do we have any surveillance drones out in the Snovski District
translation.es: ¿Tenemos drones de vigilanciaen el distrito de Snovski,

translation.en: -Got a Global Hawk Asset in the area. -Okay. I need information
translation.es: Tenemos un Global Hawk allí. Necesito información

translation.en: Is this what you're looking for?
Yes, that's him. Okay, okay. Stay on him.
[Eckhart] He's in disputed territory on the Russian border.
translation.es: Está en territorio en disputaen la frontera rusa.

translation.en: I can't send forces over unverified intel. I will start a war with the Russians.
translation.es: No puedo enviar fuerzas sin verificar. - Sería declarar la guerra.- No hace falta.
- Sería declarar la guerra.- No hace falta.
Leo es más fuerte, rápido y listo.

translation.en: -Once I find him, I'll call it in. -And then what?
translation.es: - Cuando lo encuentre, pediré ayuda.- ¿Y luego qué?

translation.en: Can we drone strike the silos without detonating the warheads?
translation.es: ¿Podemos atacar los depósitossin que detonen los misiles?

translation.en: It'll take out the command center and disarm the missiles.
translation.es: Un ataque puede desarmar los misiles.

translation.en: What if you don't get to him?
Then deny we had this conversation and pray I'm wrong about his plans.
translation.es: Negaremos esta conversacióny rezaremos por que esté equivocado.

translation.en: Let me do the right thing.
Incendiary rounds. Designed to go through armored vehicles.
translation.es: Balas incendiarias.Diseñadas para atravesar autos blindados.

translation.en: -[Harp] Those are gonna hurt. -Might up your chances against Leo.
GPS is connected to the Global Hawk.
translation.es: El GPS está conectado al dron.

translation.en: You should be good to go.
-I hope I never see you again after this. -Yeah. I'll try not to disappoint you.
translation.es: - Espero no volver a verte nunca más.- Sí. Trataré de no decepcionarlo.

translation.en: [Bale] Harp, we've lost visuals of target. [Harp] Copy that. So where the fuck am I going?
translation.es: - Harp, perdimos imágenes del objetivo.- Entendido. ¿Adónde mierda voy?

translation.en: You're right at the Russian border. Be careful.
translation.es: Estás en la frontera rusa. Ten cuidado.
Harp, quiero una confirmaciónde que eliminaremos a nuestro agente

translation.en: that we are taking out our operative, and our operative only. Do you copy?
translation.es: Harp, quiero una confirmaciónde que eliminaremos a nuestro agente y solo a nuestro agente. ¿Me copias?

translation.en: [man] Give me a second. Patching through.
Harp, according to your tracker, you're in the Dastriz Complex.
translation.es: Harp, según tu rastreador,estás en el complejo Dastriz.

translation.en: Been fucking flying over that place for years.
translation.es: Llevo años volandosobre ese maldito lugar.

translation.en: Do you have visual on Captain Leo or the Perimeter missiles? Over.
translation.es: ¿Ves al capitán Leoo los misiles? Cambio.

translation.en: Drone is in position. Your confirmation brings the rain.
translation.es: Dron en posición.Cuando confirmes, comienza a llover.

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing here, rookie?
The war is fucking bullshit, but setting off those nukes
translation.es: ¡Esta guerra es una mierda,pero esos misiles no resolverán nada!

translation.en: -won't solve anything! -Says the man that killed two to save 38.
translation.es: ¡Esta guerra es una mierda,pero esos misiles no resolverán nada! Tú mataste a dos para salvar a 38.

translation.en: -And you'll kill a million. -And I'll save a hundred million.
translation.es: - Tú matarás a un millón.- Y salvaré a cien millones.

translation.en: [man] We're picking up significant heat readings.
I see it, Bale. Stand by.
-[machine whirs] -Harp, drone is in position to strike. I need a sit-report. Over.
translation.es: El dron está en posición de atacar.Necesito un reporte. Cambio.

translation.en: Harp, I repeat. Drone in position to strike.
translation.es: Repito. Dron en posición para atacar.

translation.en: Okay. Designed to go through armored vehicles.
Okay. How do you switch it off?
How the fuck do you switch it off?
Go home to Olivia Rose Meyer.
How the fuck do you switch it off?
Harp, this is Eckhart. Can you confirm eyes on Leo? Over.
translation.es: Habla Eckhart.¿Confirmas si ves a Leo? Cambio.

translation.en: -Why the fuck are you doing this, Leo? -[Eckhart] Harp, do you copy?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué mierda haces esto, Leo?- ¿Me copias?

translation.en: Remove the humanity, increase the fight.
translation.es: Elimina a la humanidady aumentará la lucha.

translation.en: [breathes heavily] The world's first use of a fully autonomous cyborg backfires.
translation.es: El primer uso en la historia de un androidecompletamente autónomo fracasa.

translation.en: What are you saying you want? You want them to shut the program down?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que quieres?¿Quieres que cierren el programa?

translation.en: No, no, it's never that simple with you, Leo.
translation.es: No, nunca es tan simple contigo, Leo.

translation.en: You've been lying this whole time, why the fuck would I believe you anyway?
translation.es: Mentiste todo este tiempo, ¿por qué diablos te creería?

translation.en: Believe what you want, but this…
I have to destroy the monster.
They need to understand that these wars must end,
translation.es: Necesitan entenderque estas guerras deben terminar,

translation.en: and I am the face of never-ending war.
translation.es: y que yo soy el rostrode una guerra sin fin.

translation.en: How about we do it my way?
translation.es: ¿Y si lo hacemos a mi manera?
Tengo a Leo a la vista.

translation.en: You just tell us when to hit that red button, Harp.
translation.es: Dinos cuándo presionar el botón rojo.

translation.en: Jesus Christ! Better move your ass.
You, of all people, should understand that.
translation.es: Tú deberías entenderlo mejor que nadie.

translation.en: The missiles have range to the US.
translation.es: Los misiles apuntan a Estados Unidos.

translation.en: The drone strike is imminent. Clear out of there, Alpha Three.
translation.es: El ataque es inminente.Sal de ahí, Alfa Tres.

translation.en: Humans can learn to do better.
That is the greater good, Leo.
translation.es: Ese es el bien común, Leo.

translation.en: I need you to move your ass now.
Please, don't be in there, Harp.
-[woman] Good job, everybody! Well done. -[man] All right!
Harp, this is Eckhart. Do you copy?
Harp, you should be proud, son.
I already spoke to your captain, Brydon.
translation.es: Ya hablé con tu capitán, Brydon.
